# SL2.1S USB Hub

A compact USB 2.0 hub that uses the SL2.1S IC. The board features 1 USB Type-C upstream port and 4 USB Type-C downstream ports

![image](https://hc-cdn.hel1.your-objectstorage.com/s/v3/b3b95b20f6882c5b_)


---

## Schematics

The project's KiCad files can be found under `/PCB/kicad`.

![image](https://hc-cdn.hel1.your-objectstorage.com/s/v3/628bc7ab5ca48495_BxwpTj7uJCaIAAAAAElFTkSuQmCC)
